title: Ornate Initials
content:
Hi Everybody

I am designing a logo for a band. The inspiration comes from ornate initials seen in many typographic executions from the middle ages.

Can anyone suggest a font that has these or perhaps another resource where I can find these letters.

I attach a jpeg of what I mean.

Thanks in advance

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [ornate1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20100201035133/http:/typophile.com/files/ornate1.jpg) | 14.12 KB |
author: Stavros Elegarmond

comments.content:
That's Victorian, not mediaeval.  
So, it's like the difference between Oasis and the Beatles, Green Day and the Pistols.  
In other words a polished, stylized elaboration.  
I suggest you go to MyFonts.com and search for fonts by trying various keywords.
